definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Everybody in the town trusted his medicine.
sentences.chinese: 镇子里的每一个人都相信他的医术。

sentences.english: The operation was a marvel of medical skill.
sentences.chinese: 这个手术是医术的一个非凡范例。

sentences.english: There have been said to Wudang Mountain Road flyover of a skillful, often called Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 相传武当山曾有一位医术高明的道人，叫泰常。

sentences.english: The old man passed on his knowledge of traditional Chinese medicine to the younger generation.
sentences.chinese: 老中医把自己的医术传给年轻一代。

sentences.english: He brought up the orphan and passed onto him his knowledge of medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他把一个孤儿养大，并且把自己的医术传给了他。

sentences.english: Herbalism was practiced all over the world for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 草药医术在世界各地惯用了数千年之久。

sentences.english: Jerry lived in part because of his doctors.
sentences.chinese: 杰里活了下来，部分原因是他的医生医术高明。

sentences.english: To some people, herbal medicine is quackery.
sentences.chinese: 在有些人看来，用草药治病纯属江湖医术。

sentences.english: The operation was a marvel of medical skill.
sentences.chinese: 这次手术是医术上的一个奇迹。

sentences.english: The case baffles the skill of our most experienced medical men.
sentences.chinese: 这一病例使我们最有经验的医生也无法施展其医术。

sentences.english: Shun City medicine really can not think of good doctor, went to.
sentences.chinese: 阿顺实在想不到城中医术比较好的大夫，便去找忍冬。

definition: to practice medicine (esp. in private practice)
to treat the disease to save the patient/to criticize a person in order to help him
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills
practice medicine or pharmacy to help the people or public
magical hands bring the dying back to life (idiom); miracle cure/brilliant doctor
Sun Simiao (c. 581-682), doctor and herbalist of the Sui and Tang dynasty, author of Prescriptions Worth a Thousand in Gold 千金要方[Qian1 jin1 Yao4 fang1]
Wugong County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi
martial art/military accomplishments/(Peking opera) martial arts feats
